short_desc: Provides legal assistance for a range of immigration issues
description: Assists with a variety of immigration issues, including: political asylum, U visas (for victims of crime), deportation defense, DACA (Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals), VAWA (Violence Against Women Act, for victims of domestic violence who are not US citizens), NACARA (Nicaraguan Adjustment and Central American Relief Act), complex naturalization, immigration effects of criminal convictions, and benefits eligibility. Also represents detained clients.Clients are asked to leave voice message. Messages are picked up and returned twice a week.
